meanings.sent1: She enjoys retitling her artwork to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent2: The author is retitling his book to attract more readers.
meanings.sent3: After retitling her cat as 'Sir Meowsalot', everyone started calling him that.
meanings.sent4: The retitling of the building as 'The Tower of Dreams' sparked new interest in the community.
meanings.sent5: By retitling the project 'The Great Adventure', it became more exciting to work on.

meanings.definition: To change the title of something.
meanings.sent1: They are retitling the movie to appeal to a wider audience.
meanings.sent2: Retitling the event helped increase attendance.
meanings.sent3: The retitling of the play as 'The Mystery of the Missing Sock' raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: By retitling the song 'Dance in the Rain', it took on a whole new meaning.
meanings.sent5: The retitling of the restaurant as 'Flavors of the World' brought in more customers.
